honoring the man the character and the
story we were halfway into shooting the
movie when it happened we went back to
the drawing board and it was a huge
undertaking it was unprecedented there
has never been a movie faced of this
kind of setback before there wasn't
another director I could call and ask
for advice it would be an understatement
to say that James 1 and the crew didn't
have a gargantuan task ahead of them
when they had to finish the rest of the
movie without Paul it was very important
to all of us from the filmmakers to Vin
Diesel to the producers to finish this
movie and honor Paul's legacy so we dug
deep I always say I have a big bag of
cinematic tricks in my disposal and
dug so deep into this one that I used up
every single trick I can think of to
make this movie work that meant
rotoscoping paws face into several
scenes and using his brothers caleb and
cody walker as stand-ins and body
doubles they had to rewrite the scripts
to reshape the story now that they knew
Paul wouldn't be coming back which also
meant repurposing a deleted scene from
Fast Five outside of something like The
Crow this was an unprecedented problem
to lose a lead actor when only half of
his scenes were shots required
exceptional thinking to reject the
entire movie one even admitted that
there were discussions regarding
